item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Page tags aren't meant to be used in the manner you've used themâ€¦they're meant to help people find pages refering to the topic the tag indicates.

The only tag meant to be used on a player's page is the tag "players". Otherwise, it can get in the way of people trying to find information, and finding this page instead. Using your character names as tags isn't a great idea either.
